FuncDef: The reclassify-using-qos command is used to specify a sap-egress QoS policy that will be used to reclassify the forwarding class and profile of egress routed packets on the VPLS or I-VPLS service. When routed packets associated with the IP interface egress a VPLS SAP, the reclassification rules within the sap-egress QoS policy applied to the SAP are always ignored (even when reclassify-using-qos is not defined).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the SAP egress QoS policy ID. This parameter is required when executing the reclassify-using-qos command. The specified SAP egress QoS ID must exist within the system or the command fails.
